mapper.select: select server_name as name,ip,cpuLoad, memSize/(1024*1024*1024) as memSize, memUsed/(1024*1024*1024) as memUsed, ROUND(memUsed/memSize*100,0) as memPercent, ROUND(diskUsed/(1024*1024*1024),2) as diskUsed, ROUND((diskSize-diskUsed)/(1024*1024*1024),2) as diskSize, ID from xhgmnet_eastcom_server
select dstId,dstName,IP as ip from xhgmnet_dispatch order by dstId asc
select COUNT(severity) as num,severity from xhgmnet_eastcom_alarminfo where `status`!=1 GROUP BY severity
select COUNT(severity) as num,severity from xhgmnet_eastcom_alarminfo where `status`=1 and DATE_FORMAT(`time`,'%Y-%m-%d')=#{time} GROUP BY severity
